plot: Go behind-the-scenes at a 39,000-square-foot hotel resort casino for a look at its inner-workings, from the massive food orders to overseeing a huge security team, in an effort to compete with the big boys on the strip.
plot_en: Go behind-the-scenes at a 39,000-square-foot hotel resort casino for a look at its inner-workings, from the massive food orders to overseeing a huge security team, in an effort to compete with the big boys on the strip.
plot_es: Go behind-the-scenes at a 39,000-square-foot hotel resort casino for a look at its inner-workings, from the massive food orders to overseeing a huge security team, in an effort to compete with the big boys on the strip.
title: Vegas Stripped
